request.description:
This HTTP GET request is used to retrieve information about a specific outlet by its ID. The request should include the query parameter "pubId" with the value of the outlet's ID. The response will contain detailed information about the outlet and its associated merchant.

The response will have a status code of 200 if the request is successful. The response body will include information about the outlet such as its name, address, location coordinates, opening hours, contact details, and other relevant attributes. Additionally, details about the associated merchant including trade name, cashback details, campaign information, and more will also be provided.

Please note that the response may include additional fields based on the specific outlet and merchant details.
